overview: A person has a problem about creation and she is so stressful because of it. Moreover, a red pimple comes out on the nose. Time goes by, she is getting painful by the pressure of creation and a pimple. Suddenly, she decides to remove a pimple because she thinks a pimple is an origin of all her problems. From the removal pimple, she finds a green leaf which has a small yellow egg and then, the larva becomes a beautiful moss. The moss starts to fly.
title: A Pimple
